question: A special method in a Java class that is used to create objects is called a _______.
The keyword used to prevent a class from being inherited or a method from being overridden is _______.
In Java, an _______ is a reference type that can contain only constants, method signatures, default methods, and static methods.
To handle exceptions in Java, you use a _______ block.
The _______ keyword in Java is a reference to the current object.
